attributes.additional_details:
For too long have people died without reason in the land of Israel/Palestine.
the only way to bring back peace is to send peace missions to Palestine and change extremist ideologies on both states.
British intervention is now necessary.
countless individuals have perished horrifically,in these purposeless blood baths.
I ASK ALL HUMAN BEINGS!
if you as intelligent and caring people, could sign this petition.
For the ensured safety of future generations.
we have the power to make things right.For every signature we will be closer and closer to saving life in Israel/Palestine.We hear a million cry's and yet we do not take measures to prevent this suffering.
Israel/Palestine belongs to the people not the governments.

For Freedom, For Liberty, For Peace, For Justice
For Happiness.
SIGN THIS PETITION
